fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Sunny Morning Sleep-In__ (5★)
Mizuki's signature will grant her up to a total of 513 Elemental Mastery, which is her BiS. However, there are many other weapons which she can make use of as her signature is exclusively made for her.

__Starcaller’s Watch__ (5★)
Citlali’s signature, gives 365 Elemental Mastery but the DMG Bonus upon creating a shield is useless for her, but it is still a good option as a stat stick.

__Sacrifical Fragments__ (4★)
Mizuki's BiS 4-star weapon choice, it will allow Mizuki to reset her elemental skill's CD (high chance at high refinement) and will help with the energy and rotation.

fields.name: Other Weapon(s)
fields.value:
__Magic Guide__ (3★)
BiS 3-star weapon as a stat stick, even though it gives less EM than the other weapons, it is still a viable option as most players should have it, even at high refinement.
